column4: Hi, I can't print.  Printer is an old HP postscript laser, connected to a mac os x machine acting as printserver.  Any takers?
Karmic gave me some printing problems too.  HP lj2430 I think
I get error writing spool: NT_status_file_lock_conflict
I turned on windows sharing on the mac, seemed like the easiest way to get printing access to the linux machine
